featured.text: After the war, a giant paperclip statue was erected in Oslo to 40 Vaaler—even though his design was never actually manufactured.
Its manufacture also leaves a smaller carbon footprint.

definition.zh_def: 製造，尤其是大規模生產商品的過程。
definition.en_def: To make or produce goods, especially on a large scale using machinery.
definition.example: The company plans to manufacture new smartphones next year.
